casebody.data:
GOOGLE LLC, Petitioner,
v.
ORACLE AMERICA, INC. No. 18-956. Supreme Court of the United States. May 4, 2020

The parties is directed to file supplemental letter briefs addressing the appropriate standard of review for the second question presented, including but not limited to the implications of the Seventh Amendment, if any, on that standard. The briefs, not to exceed 10 pages, is to be filed simultaneously with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 2 p.m., Friday, August 7, 2020.
